original_text: Let us, therefore, make every effort to enter that rest, so that no one will perish by following their example of disobedience.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 저 안식에 들어가기를 힘쓸지니 이는 누구든지 저 순종하지 아니하는 본에 빠지지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Let us, therefore, make every effort
so that no one will perish
by following their example of disobedience
